title: Bacon, Spinach and Goats Cheese Quiche
ingredients: ['1kg frozen chopped spinach', '1 sheet ready-rolled shortcrust pastry', '1 teaspoon vegetable oil for greasing', '150g goat cheese', '2 eggs', '200ml single cream', '4-6 rashers thin sliced streaky bacon', '75g grated Gruyere cheese (optional)', 'salt and pepper to taste']
